segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the open cabinets first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is right there, full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is stretched up on that shaky stool, grabbing some cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me worried; he could fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her hand out, waiting patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for this little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the woman at the sink is oblivious, polishing her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh no, the faucet is still running, and water is spilling everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is growing, soaking the floor and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should turn off the water before it's a real mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden outside, so calm compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These kids are just trying to have fun, but it's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR
